Audience: Engineering

Purpose
-------
Canonical JSON Schema fragments and example payloads used by control-plane and runtime components.

Schema index
------------
- List of schema files and $id values (if split into `schemas/`).

Example request/response schemas
-------------------------------
- Canonical request and response JSON Schema snippets.

JWT / token claims
------------------
- Standard claim shapes, signing policies, and JWKS guidance.

Validation & CI
---------------
- How to integrate schema validation into CI and where to store machine-readable schemas.
